metadata.title: JODC Marine Organisms Database
metadata.description:
Parameter Plankton distribution and abundance Measurement Details "This file contains marine organisms data, mainly plankton, observed by Environment Agency, Fisheries Agency and Meteorological Agency in JODC own format. This data management system composes of 3 subsystems, namely Marine Organisms Code Management, Marine Organisms Data Management, Marine Organisms Data Processing.  

[ A TCODE project ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Archive and service as National Oceanographic Data Center in Japan.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Continually

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
